document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b46090">Trust </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b46090">adjusts </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">her </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#28ff42">"Peradventure" </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b46090">Phantoms </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#489cff">entered </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">"and </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">not </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">you." </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: Trust adjusts her "peradventure"
